typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	date_format as string ("yyyy-MM-dd")
}
source(output(
		id as short,
		datetime as string,
		product_id as short,
		shop_id as short,
		qnty as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[("data/" + toString(year(currentDate())) + "/" + toString(month(currentDate())) + "/" + toString(dayOfMonth(minus(currentDate(), 1)) ) + "/dbo.arrivals.csv")]) ~> Arrivals
source(output(
		id as short,
		datetime as string,
		product_id as short,
		shop_id as short,
		qnty as short,
		price as double,
		cost as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[("data/" + toString(year(currentDate())) + "/" + toString(month(currentDate())) + "/" + toString(dayOfMonth(minus(currentDate(), 1)) ) + "/dbo.sales.csv")]) ~> Sales
source(output(
		id as short,
		name as string,
		category_id as boolean,
		price_net as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[("data/" + toString(year(currentDate())) + "/" + toString(month(currentDate())) + "/" + toString(dayOfMonth(minus(currentDate(), 1)) ) + "/dbo.products.csv")]) ~> Products
Arrivals filter(toDate(datetime, $date_format) < currentDate($date_format)) ~> ArrivalsFilterByDate
Sales filter(toDate(datetime, $date_format) < currentDate($date_format)) ~> SalesFilterByDate
ArrivalsFilterByDate select(mapColumn(
		product_id_arrivals = product_id,
		shop_id_arrivals = shop_id,
		qnty_arrivals = qnty
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumns
JoinProductsToArrivals aggregate(groupBy(shop_id_arrivals,
		product_id_arrivals),
	qnty = sum(qnty_arrivals),
		price = sum(price_net * qnty_arrivals)) ~> ArrivalsFinalCostAndQnty
RenameColumns, Products join(product_id_arrivals == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProductsToArrivals
SalesFilterByDate aggregate(groupBy(shop_id,
		product_id),
	sold = sum(cost),
		sold_qnty = sum(qnty)) ~> SalesFinalSoldnQnty
ArrivalsFinalCostAndQnty, SalesFinalSoldnQnty join(shop_id_arrivals == shop_id
	&& product_id_arrivals == product_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 aggregate(groupBy(datetime = currentDate(),
		shop_id,
		product_id),
	merge = max(sold-price),
		remains = max(qnty-sold_qnty)) ~> Aggregate4
Aggregate4, Products join(product_id == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
Join4 select(mapColumn(
		datetime,
		shop_id,
		product_name = name,
		merge,
		remains
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 sink(input(
		datetime as timestamp,
		shop_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		merge as decimal(18,0),
		remains as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	dateFormat:'yyyy/MM/dd',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
